title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Azure AI Foundry: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Azure AI Foundry. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Azure AI Foundry? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Azure AI Foundry
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2026 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Azure AI Foundry (developer tools) is Azure AI Foundry is Microsoft's comprehensive AI development platform launched in May 2026 for building, deploying, and managing AI agents and applications. It features Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration, unified SDK combining Semantic Kernel and AutoGen, and support for Agent-to-Agent (A2A) and Model Context Protocol (MCP). Its unique value is enterprise-grade AI development with seamless Azure ecosystem integration, enabling professional developers to build sophisticated agentic applications at scale.. Users choose it for ai-platform, ai-agents, microsoft.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)
Azure AI Foundry: AI Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration, Unified SDK (Semantic Kernel + AutoGen), Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol support

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Azure AI Foundry are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Azure AI Foundry for ai-platform.
